types:type.name: Order
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type Order = {| orderData: {| poNumber: Number {"typeId": "int"}, signatureRequiredFlag: Boolean, shipInstructions: String, giftWrapFlag: Boolean, giftWrapMessage: String, currencyCode: String, subTotal: Number {"typeId": "double"}, customerSalesforceId: String |}, items: Array<{| id: Number {"typeId": "int"}, category: String, quantity: Number {"typeId": "int"}, size: String |}> |} {"example": "{\\\"orderData\\\":{\\\"poNumber\\\":123473,\\\"signatureRequiredFlag\\\":false,\\\"shipInstructions\\\":\\\"Dont break it\\\",\\\"giftWrapFlag\\\":true,\\\"giftWrapMessage\\\":\\\"You rock!\\\",\\\"currencyCode\\\":\\\"USD\\\",\\\"subTotal\\\":41.5,\\\"customerSalesforceId\\\":\\\"sasda324jh234\\\"},\\\"items\\\":[{\\\"id\\\":12345,\\\"category\\\":\\\"T-Shirt\\\",\\\"quantity\\\":4,\\\"size\\\":\\\"M\\\"},{\\\"id\\\":34567,\\\"category\\\":\\\"Hoodie\\\",\\\"quantity\\\":2,\\\"size\\\":\\\"M\\\"}]}"}

types:type.name: OrderSf
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type OrderSf = {| Id: Number {"typeId": "int"}, PoNumber__c: Number {"typeId": "int"}, SignatureRequired__c: Boolean, ShipInstructions__c: String, GiftWrapFlag__c: Boolean, GiftWrapMessage__c: String, CurrencyCode__c: String, SubTotal__c: Number {"typeId": "double"}, Customer__c: String |} {"example": "{\\\"Id\\\":21312,\\\"PoNumber__c\\\":1232131,\\\"SignatureRequired__c\\\":false,\\\"ShipInstructions__c\\\":\\\"dont break it!\\\",\\\"GiftWrapFlag__c\\\":true,\\\"GiftWrapMessage__c\\\":\\\"abc123\\\",\\\"CurrencyCode__c\\\":\\\"USD\\\",\\\"SubTotal__c\\\":13.4,\\\"Customer__c\\\":\\\"adasdas312312\\\"}"}

types:type.name: OrderData
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type OrderData = {| poNumber: Number {"typeId": "int"}, signatureRequiredFlag: Boolean, shipInstructions: String, giftWrapFlag: Boolean, giftWrapMessage: String, currencyCode: String, subTotal: Number {"typeId": "double"}, customerId: String |} {"example": "{\\\"poNumber\\\":123473,\\\"signatureRequiredFlag\\\":false,\\\"shipInstructions\\\":\\\"Dont break it\\\",\\\"giftWrapFlag\\\":true,\\\"giftWrapMessage\\\":\\\"You rock!\\\",\\\"currencyCode\\\":\\\"USD\\\",\\\"subTotal\\\":41.5,\\\"customerId\\\":\\\"sasda324jh234\\\"}"}
